SEARCH
Package Bike

Class Bike

java.lang.Object
Bike.Bike
Direct Known Subclasses:
Electric, MountainBike, Regular
public abstract class Bike extends Object
Represents a generic bike which can be used for rental purposes. This abstract class provides basic attributes such as distance traveled, rental status, and the total distance the bike has covered.

This class is used for identification of the bike, kilometres, hours, and total kilometres tracked.
